thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com
thread.title: Ruth Ann

author: Ruth Ann
title: Ruth Ann
text: I'VE BEEN ORDERING FROM HDIS FOR OVER 3 YEARS...FOR MY HUSBAND WHO HAS PROSTATE CANCER AND INCONTINENT. THE STAFF IS ALWAYS WILLING TO HELP ME FIND THE PRODUCTS I NEED FOR HIM AND ADVISE ME ON NEWER PRODUCTS TOO. PLUS, THEY SET IT UP ALL ON A QUARTERLY AUTOMATIC DELIVERY VIA FEDEX TO MY DOOR, SO I NEVER RUN OUT. AND I LIKE THE FACTOR THAT IT IS A SMALL COMPANY EASIER TO WORK WITH THE FRIENDLY STAFF...
